[source, python]
----
resp = client.search(
    index="kibana_sample_data_ecommerce",
    size=0,
    aggs={
        "sales_by_category": {
            "terms": {
                "field": "category.keyword",
                "size": 5,
                "order": {
                    "_count": "desc"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
